齂字的基本解释

齂
xiè
鼾声。

齂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》許介切，去怪，曉。］
［《廣韻》虚器切，去至，曉。］
［《廣韻》莫八切，入黠，明。］
(1)鼻息。
(2)歇息。参见“齂呬”。

齂字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼻字部】　齂； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1530第33
【唐韻】【集韻】?許介切，音譮。【說文】臥息也。【爾雅·釋詁】齂，息也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】虛器切【正韻】許意切，?音?。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?莫八切，音㑻。又【集韻】詡鬼切，音虫。又【集韻】【類篇】?訏貴切，音諱。義?同。

齂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
齂字的起名意思

暂无。

齂
Basic explanation of words
齂
xiè
snore.
齂
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" Xu Jieqie, go to blame, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" virtual device cut, go to, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Mo eight cuts, enter the key, Ming. ]
(1) Sniffing.
(2) Rest. See "齂呬".
齂
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Nose Department] 　齂; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 1530 33
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Xu Jieqie, sound Zong. [Said the text] lie down. 【Erya·Release】Fun, breathe.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Virtual Device Cut [Zheng Yun] Xu Yi cut, "Yin?". The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Mo eight cut, sound 㑻. Also 【Jiyun】Cut ghosts, sound insects. Also [Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Xu Guiqie, taboo. Righteous? Same.
